title: Healthy Gloss 5 Relaxer Kit - Super Hair Color Women by Dark And Lovely
features: Recharges hair with 5x more conditioning power
description: Product Description

Reloads hair instantly with inner strength and protection with a silky-soft result. Recharges hair with 5x more conditioning power fo moisture and body. Replenishes hair with knock-out shine and softness.
From the Manufacturer
Dark & Lovely®
creators of the first no-lye relaxer, introduces Generation 2000 technology!
Advanced No-Lye formula that straightens better and lasts longer.
Quadro-Conditioning System
with four advanced conditioning steps working in synergy to leave your hair soft, silky and healthy-looking.
Relaxer Creme with Built-In PreCare
to help protect and condition hair during relaxing.
Ingredients:

Water, Petrolatum, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, PEG-75 Lanolin, Guanidine Carbonate, Polyquaternium-6, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Propylene Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), D&C Orange No. 4 (Cl 15510), Succinic Acid, Denatonium Benzoate.
Color-signal Neutralizing Shampoo
to gently cleanse and moisturize the hair.
Ingredients:

Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Laureth Sulfite, Lauramide DEA, Propylene Glycol, polyquarternium-7, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Phenolsulfonphthalein
Ultra Cholesterol™ Conditioning Treatment
to help intensively strengthen, moisturize and mend split ends.
Ingredients:

Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum) Dicetyldimonium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polyquaternium-32, Cholesterol, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis, Fragrance, D&C No. 33 (Cl 17200), Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone.
Hydra-Moisturizing Leave-In Conditioner
to help seal moisture inside the hair shaft, gently detangle and give body and styling control.
Ingredients:

Water, Polyquaternium-22, Polyquaternium-11, Dimethicone Copolyol Laurate, Dimethicone Copolyol, DMDM Hydantoin, Panthenol, Oleth-20, Silk Amino Acids, Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis, External D&C Violet No. 2 (Cl 60730).
